name: Chase (itch) (funkybeats02)
description:
You are enjoying a ride in your brand new car, but to your surprise, two black luxury cars start to follow you. Before you know it, you are in a car chase! When the game begins, immediately step on the gas, collect coins to boost your score, and most importantly...don't get caught! The longer you stay in the chase, the greater your score. Have fun!

Controls:

W: accelerator

S: brake

Left Arrow: turn left

Right Arrow: turn right

Hold Left Shift: Rear view
